item.title: Click Rate Drops Investigate
item.description: Customer concerns Customer think there still have issue after P1 VOD click loss Firewall issue being resolved by upstream tracking team on May 3rd. select sent_event_type_desc, SENT_DT, COUNT( DISTINCT CASE WHEN actn_type = 'SEND' THEN CHNL_TRCKNG_ID ELSE NULL END ) AS SENDS, COUNT( CASE WHEN actn_type = 'CLICK' THEN CHNL_TRCKNG_ID ELSE NULL END ) CLICKS, round(clicks / sends * 100, 2) click_rate from ACCESS_VIEWS.mh_event a where A.ACTN_DT >= '2023-04-15' and a.
